thread.title: Obama taking weekend trip to New York City
thread.title_full: Obama taking weekend trip to New York City

author: Jordan Fabian
title: Obama taking weekend trip to New York City
text: Obama taking weekend trip to New York City By Jordan Fabian - 07/16/15 07:15 PM EDT President Obama is getting away from the nation’s capital Friday for a trip to the Big Apple. The president will attend a Democratic National Committee fundraiser Friday night in New York City and stay overnight to spend time with his daughters, Malia and Sasha, the White House said. ADVERTISEMENT The White House has not released further details about the trip, but the New York Post reports he plans to attend a matinee showing of the Broadway show “Hamilton” on Saturday before returning to Washington. The hip-hop musical , which follows the life of founding father Alexander Hamilton, is one of the hottest tickets in town, taking in $27.6 million in advance sales. Malia, 17, is reportedly in New York this summer interning on the HBO series “Girls.” Past: 1 day Yellen urges Congress to be wary...
